name: Footballiga
description1: A web3 game on Ethereum blockchain platform along with NFT of Iranian Premier League players. Buy your favorite players and make your dream team!
field:
Login to the site with your wallet 
 Buy your favorite players 
 Make your team 
 And wait for the games to start
footer: Make your team before it's too late
about1: Footbolliga was created on the Goerli testnet with the aim of creating an entertainment along with blockchain and NFT training
about2: Money is not real on this network, so if you are not familiar with blockchain,
about3: it is a good opportunity to learn safely, and start buying and selling football cards with free money
